content.raw: You are right, it was missing, but I think you may be one revision behind. I committed, then realized the timer wasn’t being started, then committed again to fix it. Currently the call you mention is under OnRunning \(which I did just to imitate the way you implemented it for the stationkeeping plugin--but let me know if it should go somewhere else\).
content.html: You are right, it was missing, but I think you may be one revision behind. I committed, then realized the timer wasn’t being started, then committed again to fix it. Currently the call you mention is under OnRunning (which I did just to imitate the way you implemented it for the stationkeeping plugin--but let me know if it should go somewhere else).
